Class VuMatchClient

extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing all functionality that needed to contact VuMatch API
    Author:
    Vufind

    • Constructor Detail

      • VuMatchClient

        public VuMatchClient(Context context,
             java.lang.String customerId,
             java.lang.String appKey,
             java.lang.String appToken)
        Construct a client object used to connect to VuMatch API
        Parameters:
        context - valid Android context
        customerId - your customer id as registered with VuMatch API
        appKey - your application key registered with VuMatch API
        appToken - your application token registered with VuMatch API

    • Method Detail

      • postImage

        public void postImage(java.lang.String category,
             Uri imageUri,
             com.vufind.android.vumatch.VuMatchAPIAccessCallbackHandler callback)
        Post an image to VuMatch API and get a list of matching product recommendations
        Parameters:
        category - product category
        imageUri - Uri to the image to be uploaded
        callback - callback handler to receive response from VuMatch client while processing your request
